All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Activity
Abstract class for all activities
ActivityAndUsageReporter
Class that generates activity and usage report
Appliance
Interface for all appliances

Interface for appliance factory

ApplianceType
Enum representing all possible types of appliances.

Bicycle item
Blind
Class representing blind
BrokennessLevel
Enum representing the level of brokenness of an appliance.
Car
Car item
CircuitBreaker
Circuit breaker is a sensor that can turn off all appliances in the house (except fridges and other sensors).

Close blinds activity
Component
Interface for updatable and visitable objects.

Class representing computer

Class that generates consumption report

Represents cooking activity.
Dishwasher
Class representing dishwasher

Activity for doing sport
EatActivity
Activity of eating food from fridge.
Event
Abstract class representing event
EventErrorException
Exception that is thrown when there is a problem with creation of an object
EventGenerator
Class that generates random events
EventLoader
Class that loads all events from package
EventLoaderTest
 
EventReporter
Class that generates event report
Executor
Executor is a class that represents a person that can execute activities.
ExecutorStatus
Enum for Executor status
FileManager
Class represents file manager to write into file.
FlameDetector
Class representing flame detector
FlameDetectorEvent
Event that is created when flame detector detects fire
Floor
Class representing floor in the home
Food
Food item
Fridge
Fridge is an appliance that stores food.
Helper
Helper class
Home
Class representing home
HomeAppliance
HomeAppliance is an abstract class that represents an appliance in a smart home.
HomeApplianceFactory
Factory for home appliances
HomeBuilder
Interface defines a contract for building homes.
HomeConfigurationVisitor
Class that generates home configuration report
HomeDirector
Director for building homes
Item
Class representing an item
ItemType
Enum representing the type of an item
Kettle
Represents Kettle appliance
KeyWrapper
KeyWrapper for role and appliance type for using in ActivityAndUsageReporter
Main
Main class that starts simulation.
MakeCoffeeActivity
Activity of making coffee
Manual
Class representing manual for appliance.
NeedToCook
Event that is created when person needs to cook
NeedToDoSport
Event that is created when person needs to do sport
NeedToEat
Event that is created when person needs to eat
NeedToEatPet
Event that is created when pet needs to eat
NeedToPlayWithToy
Event that is created when pet needs to play with toy
NeedToRepairAppliance
Event that is created when appliance is broken and needs to be repaired
NeedToRest
Event that is created when person needs to rest
NeedToSchool
Event that is created when kid needs to go to school
NeedToVacation
Event that is created when person needs to go on vacation
NeedToWalkPet
Event that is created when pet needs to walk
NeedToWashClothes
Event that is created when person needs to wash clothes
NeedToWatchTV
Event that is created when person needs to watch TV
NeedToWork
Event that is created when adult needs to go to work
Observer
Observer class is used to notify random listener about event

Activity for opening blinds

Represents Oven appliance

Person is an executor with a name.

Role of a person in a family.

RollerSkates item
Room
Class representing room in the home
RoomBuilder
Interface defines the contract for building rooms in a building.
RoomDirector
Class is responsible for directing the construction of rooms using a RoomBuilder and various other components.
RoomType
Types of room that will be created.
RunOutActivity
Activity of running out of house
SchoolActivity
Activity of studying in school

Class representing Sensor appliance

Main simulation class that contains main simulation loop.

Facade for simple start of the simulation.

Snowboard item
SourceType
Enum representing type of source
StandardHomeBuilder
Class is an implementation of the HomeBuilder interface.
StandardRoomBuilder
Standard implementation of the RoomBuilder interface.
State
Abstract class representing state of the appliance.
StateBroken
StateBroken represents a state of a home appliance when it is broken.
StateIdle
StateIdle represents a state of a home appliance when it is idle.
StateOff
StateOff represents a state of a home appliance when it is off.
StateOn
StateOn represents a state of a home appliance when it is on.
